name: KeyStore Protection Checking
description: The Keystores below seem **NOT** protected by password. This is a security hazard since malicious users that have physical access to the Keystore file can access the keys and certificates contained in it.
remediation: Please provide a valid password for each of the Keystores contained in the app.

references.text: Further information on the creation and usage of a valid Keystore file can be found in the following example guides [[1], [2]].
